coachView.name: File Uploader
coachView.layout:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><ns2:layout xmlns:ns2="http://www.ibm.com/bpm/CoachDesignerNG" xmlns:ns3="http://www.ibm.com/bpm/coachview"><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:CustomHTML" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>5492149d-36c7-42fd-8960-f312db60c153</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>CustomHTML1</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>fb1eb00a-e508-4b72-8267-b6766f957397</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.contentType</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>TEXT</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>8ae8cee3-445f-48ee-8bf6-d029710b35ff</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.textContent</ns2:optionName><ns2:value><div id="modal-container" title="File Uploader">
   <p>This is an animated dialog which is useful for displaying information. The dialog window can be moved, resized and closed with the 'x' icon.</p>
</div>
<a id="modal-btn" class="fileupload-btn" href="#">Upload File</a></ns2:value></ns2:configData></ns2:layoutItem></ns2:layout>

inlineScript.name: Inline Javascript
